animeDescription: Sakura Nankyoku is a total otaku. Due to a fluke, she gets elected as her class' Student Council President. Everything takes off from there into a series of crazy misadventures revolving around Sakura, her family, and her classmates.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Nankyoku, Sakura', 'Kurio, Nene', 'Etorofu, Kujira', 'Whitebear, Mary Chupacabra W.', 'Chi, Cha', 'Ijuin, Kare', 'Houjiro, Maguro', 'Sebastian', 'Hojiro, Saki', 'Miho-chan-sensei']
